Who Am I,You Ask?

The name is Goitseone Kau. Certified Web Developer. Since in 2023.
Located around Pretoria, Gauteng.

I aspire to be proficient in Web Design and Development. Outside of work,
I enjoy good cup of tea and nice novel plus scifi movies, as they have unique ideas and storylines that go into my designs.
A smart worker and a thinker. Enrolled myself in web development courses to venture in skills that can bring any business or corporations website to come alive.
